member.name: T:Sitas.Edge.Mqtt.Attributes.MqttSubscribeAttribute
member.summary: Marks a message handler class to subscribe to an MQTT topic. Multiple attributes can be applied to subscribe to multiple topics.
member.remarks:
MQTT Topic Wildcards: - Single-level: + (matches exactly one topic level) - Multi-level: # (matches any number of levels, must be last character)
Examples: - "machines/+/heartbeat" matches "machines/123/heartbeat" - "sensors/#" matches "sensors/temp/room1" and "sensors/humidity"
